pullRequest.title: Optimize obtaining card metadata from Note
pullRequest.bodyText: While porting upstream test, I did realize that sometime I only needed ids of cards of a note and not the cards itself. I added the method; I then realized that this method could be used in a lot of place. While replacing this method, I then realized that, often, either we only take the first card, or we take the size, so I created method to do it more efficiently and with less code

nodes.bodyText: cardCount or numberOfCards would be better here: nb is ambiguous
You don't need an order by here.
Likely not worth it, but firstCid() could be optimised
